title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama and llama.cpp embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama API with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js wrapper that exposes Ollama endpoints with RxJS streams.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate that maps Ollama REST endpoints into strongly-typed functions.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat application that proxies to Ollama with conversation memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-gpt4all-bridge
summary: GPT4All backend that re-uses Ollama’s model files for unified local inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration letting pipelines use Ollama generators and embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package page for the ollama Python client.

title: ollama-models-registry
summary: Community-contributed Modelfile definitions for Llama, Phi, Starling, etc.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Subreddit for sharing tools, benchmarks, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
